import React from 'react' import { BsFillArrowRightCircleFill, BsFillArrowLeftCircleFill } from "react-icons/bs"; import { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const Reservation = () => { var current = new Date() var currentdate = current.toDateString() const [days, setDays] = useState(1) const [date, setDate] = useState(currentdate) function nextDate () { current.setDate(current.getDate() + days) currentdate = current.toDateString() setDays(days + 1) setDate(currentdate) } function previousDate () { current.setDate(current.getDate() + (days - 2)) currentdate = current.toDateString() setDays(days - 1) setDate(currentdate) } const getreq = (e) => { axios.get('http://localhost:4000/app/reservations', {}) .then(res => { console.log(res.data) }) .catch((error) => console.log('Error sending data:', error)) } return (

Reservation

days !== 1 ? previousDate() : '' } style={{cursor:'pointer'}} /> {`${' '}${date}${' '}`} nextDate()} style={{cursor:'pointer'}}/>
) } export default Reservation
